entry.title: Re: Electronic Invoices for Malaysia: A Guide for Communication Settings
entry.content: Hi @gerhardhoebinger, the certificate from certified vendors, did it include Digital Signature capabilities? and were you connecting to IRBM Malaysia XML version 1.1 or 1.0? Coz our understanding is that version 1.0 does not include Digital Signature capabilities, hence would not require certificate configuration. Version 1.1 is the IRBM version that includes Digital Signature capabilities that would require Digital Signature Certificate from certified vendors.

entry.title: CDS View as DataSource for BW/B4HANA & CDS Implemented via AMDP method to support complex logic
entry.content:
In S4HANA system, We need a ABAP CDS view to be developed as DataSource  for the B4HANA system consumption. But there are limitations in ABAP CDS view and to overcome we can implement the CDS view via AMDP method and class. This blog explains the same so in case of complex transformation we can use the AMDP method in CDS to handle those complex scenarios. 

Below are the steps to be followed

Create a class which implement "IF_AMDP_MARKER_HDB" interface. In my case my class name is ZBW4_FI_TREASURYITEMCOUNTER_01.

add a static method to implement the logic for CDS. In my case i have used the method "TREASURYITEMCOUNTER"

Inside the method i have used the below code 

method treasuryitemcounter by database function for hdb language sqlscript using vtbfhapo vtbfha usr21 adrp tzb0t but000 t001 adrc.
/*
The tables used for the logic must be added in method signature after "using" keyword.
Company Code,
Financial Transaction and Fiscal year are concatenated to get transaction_id column.
*/

lt_vtbghapo = select VTBFHAPO.MANDT as client_element_name,
                         concat(concat(VTBFHAPO.BUKRS,right(VTBFHAPO.RFHA,10)),left(VTBFHAPO.GJAHR,4)) transaction_id,
                         vtbfhapo.bukrs as vtbfhapo_bukrs ,
                         vtbfhapo.rfha as vtbfhapo_rfha,
                         vtbfhapo.rantyp as vtbfhapo_rantyp,
                         vtbfhapo.ssign as vtbfhapo_ssign,
                         vtbfhapo.sbfrei as vtbfhapo_sbfrei,
                         vtbfhapo.dzterm as vtbfhapo_dzterm,
                         vtbfha.merkm as vtbfha_merkm,
                         vtbfha.merkm as Description,
                         vtbfhapo.cruser as VTBFHAPO_cruser,
                         usr21.bname as usr21_bname,
                         adrp.name_text as adrp_name_text,
                         adrp.name_text as Username,
                         vtbfhapo.sfhazba as VTBFHAPO_SFHAZBA,
                         tzb0t.rantyp as TZB0T_RANTYP,
                         tzb0t.sbewart as TZB0T_SBEWART,
                         tzb0t.XBEWART as FlowCategory,
                         vtbfhapo.wzbetr as VTBFHAPO_WZBETR,
                         vtbfhapo.wzbetr as Currency,
                         vtbfhapo.cruser as EnteredBy,
                         vtbfha.kontrh as VTBFHA_KONTRH,
                         but000.partner as BUT000_PARTNER,
                         but000.name_org1 as BUT000_NAME_ORG1,
                         but000.name_org1 as PartnerName,
                         '' as Vendor,
                         '' as VendorName,
                         vtbfhapo.bukrs as Customer,
                         t001.bukrs as T001_BUKRS,
                         adrc.name1 as ADRC_NAME1,
                         adrc.name1 as CustomerName,
                         left(VTBFHAPO.GJAHR,4) as FiscalYear,
                         vtbfha.dblfz as DocumentDate,
                         vtbfhapo.dbuchung as PostingDate,
                         vtbfhapo.dzterm as DueDate,
                         vtbfhapo.dzterm as AdjustedDueDate,
                         vtbfhapo.dzterm as TransactionDate,
                         'Treasury' as Team,
                         vtbfhapo.bzbetr as VTBFHAPO_BZBETR,
                         vtbfhapo.bzbetr as ActualAmount
                         from VTBFHAPO
                         left outer join
                         vtbfha --Transaction Table
                         on
                         vtbfha.rfha = vtbfhapo.rfha and
                         vtbfha.bukrs = vtbfhapo.bukrs AND
                         vtbfha.MANDT = Session_context('CLIENT')
                         left outer join
                         usr21
                         on
                         usr21.bname  = vtbfhapo.cruser AND
                         usr21.MANDT = Session_context('CLIENT')
                         left outer join
                         adrp
                         on
                         adrp.persnumber = usr21.persnumber AND
                         adrp.CLIENT = Session_context('CLIENT')
                         left outer join
                         tzb0t
                         on
                         tzb0t.rantyp = vtbfhapo.rantyp and
                         tzb0t.sbewart = vtbfhapo.sfhazba and
                         tzb0t.sspras = 'E' AND
                         tzb0t.MANDT = Session_context('CLIENT')
                         left outer join
                         but000
                         on
                         but000.PARTNER = vtbfha.kontrh AND
                         but000.CLIENT = Session_context('CLIENT')
                         left outer join
                         t001
                         on
                         t001.bukrs = vtbfhapo.bukrs and
                         t001.MANDT = Session_context('CLIENT')
                         left outer join
                         adrc
                         on
                         adrc.addrnumber = t001.adrnr and
                         adrc.CLIENT = Session_context('CLIENT')
                         where
                         VTBFHAPO.MANDT = Session_context('CLIENT');

/* 
In local table lt_vtbghapo_01 we try to get the rownumber as "counter", for the previously derived column "transaction_id" at local table lt_vtbghapo. Pad it in left with 000
*/
    lt_vtbghapo_01 = select *,
                            LPAD(row_number( ) over (
                                 PARTITION by transaction_id order by  transaction_id ASC) ,3,0
                                ) as counter
                            from :lt_vtbghapo;
/* In local table "lt_vtbghapo_02" we again concatenate the generated row number for every transaction id */ 
    lt_vtbghapo_02 = select client_element_name,
                            concat(transaction_id,counter) as transaction_id,
                            VTBFHAPO_BUKRS,
                            VTBFHAPO_RFHA,
                            VTBFHAPO_RANTYP,
                            VTBFHAPO_SSIGN,
                            VTBFHAPO_SBFREI,
                            VTBFHAPO_DZTERM,
                            VTBFHA_MERKM,
                            DESCRIPTION,
                            VTBFHAPO_CRUSER,
                            USR21_BNAME,
                            ADRP_NAME_TEXT,
                            USERNAME,
                            VTBFHAPO_SFHAZBA,
                            TZB0T_RANTYP,
                            TZB0T_SBEWART,
                            FLOWCATEGORY,
                            VTBFHAPO_WZBETR,
                            CURRENCY,
                            ENTEREDBY,
                            VTBFHA_KONTRH,
                            BUT000_PARTNER,
                            BUT000_NAME_ORG1,
                            PARTNERNAME,
                            VENDOR,
                            VENDORNAME,
                            CUSTOMER,
                            T001_BUKRS,
                            ADRC_NAME1,
                            CUSTOMERNAME,
                            FISCALYEAR,
                            DOCUMENTDATE,
                            POSTINGDATE,
                            DUEDATE,
                            ADJUSTEDDUEDATE,
                            TRANSACTIONDATE,
                            TEAM,
                            VTBFHAPO_BZBETR,
                            ACTUALAMOUNT
                            from :lt_vtbghapo_01;

/* make sure the return matches the CDS needs. This return statement is important and must contain all the columns that are needed for the CDS view*/
    return select client_element_name,
                  transaction_id,
                  VTBFHAPO_BUKRS,
                            VTBFHAPO_RFHA,
                            VTBFHAPO_RANTYP,
                            VTBFHAPO_SSIGN,
                            VTBFHAPO_SBFREI,
                            VTBFHAPO_DZTERM,
                            VTBFHA_MERKM,
                            DESCRIPTION,
                            VTBFHAPO_CRUSER,
                            USR21_BNAME,
                            ADRP_NAME_TEXT,
                            USERNAME,
                            VTBFHAPO_SFHAZBA,
                            TZB0T_RANTYP,
                            TZB0T_SBEWART,
                            FLOWCATEGORY,
                            VTBFHAPO_WZBETR,
                            CURRENCY,
                            ENTEREDBY,
                            VTBFHA_KONTRH,
                            BUT000_PARTNER,
                            BUT000_NAME_ORG1,
                            PARTNERNAME,
                            VENDOR,
                            VENDORNAME,
                            CUSTOMER,
                            T001_BUKRS,
                            ADRC_NAME1,
                            CUSTOMERNAME,
                            FISCALYEAR,
                            DOCUMENTDATE,
                            POSTINGDATE,
                            DUEDATE,
                            ADJUSTEDDUEDATE,
                            TRANSACTIONDATE,
                            TEAM,
                            VTBFHAPO_BZBETR,
                            ACTUALAMOUNT from :lt_vtbghapo_02;

  endmethod.

Now the logic has been implemented in the method. We need to link this method and class to the ABAP CDS. To do so you need to create table function as given below which is implemented by above method.

The columns returned by the method and must match the "returns" mentioned in "table function" in the same sequence.

 

@EndUserText.label: 'BW4: FI TR Transaction ID Counter'
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
define table function ZTFITRDOCCOUN01F
returns
{
  client_element_name : abap.clnt;
  transaction_id      : abap.char( 24 );
  VTBFHAPO_BUKRS      : bukrs;
  VTBFHAPO_RFHA       : tb_rfha;
  VTBFHAPO_RANTYP     : rantyp;
  VTBFHAPO_SSIGN      : tb_ssign;
  VTBFHAPO_SBFREI     : tb_sbfrei;
  VTBFHAPO_DZTERM     : tb_dzterm;
  VTBFHA_MERKM        : tb_merkm;
  DESCRIPTION         : tb_merkm;
  VTBFHAPO_CRUSER     : tb_cruser;
  USR21_BNAME         : xubname;
  ADRP_NAME_TEXT      : ad_namtext;
  USERNAME            : ad_namtext;
  VTBFHAPO_SFHAZBA    : tb_sfhazba;
  TZB0T_RANTYP        : rantyp;
  TZB0T_SBEWART       : sbewart;
  FLOWCATEGORY        : xbewart;
  VTBFHAPO_WZBETR     : tb_wzbetr;
  CURRENCY            : tb_wzbetr;
  ENTEREDBY           : tb_cruser;
  VTBFHA_KONTRH       : tb_kunnr_new;
  BUT000_PARTNER      : bu_partner;
  BUT000_NAME_ORG1    : bu_nameor1;
  PARTNERNAME         : bu_nameor1;
  VENDOR              : abap.char( 1 );
  VENDORNAME          : abap.char( 1 );
  CUSTOMER            : bukrs;
  T001_BUKRS          : bukrs;
  ADRC_NAME1          : ad_name1;
  CUSTOMERNAME        : ad_name1;
  FISCALYEAR          : abap.numc( 4 );
  DOCUMENTDATE        : tb_dblfz;
  POSTINGDATE         : budat;
  DUEDATE             : tb_dzterm;
  ADJUSTEDDUEDATE     : tb_dzterm;
  TRANSACTIONDATE     : tb_dzterm;
  TEAM                : abap.char( 8 );
  VTBFHAPO_BZBETR     : tb_bzbetr;
  ACTUALAMOUNT        : tb_bzbetr;
}
implemented by method
  zbw4_fi_treasuryitemcounter_01=>treasuryitemcounter;

Now

* we have class and method which has implemented the logic

* we have table function that is implemented by the previously defined class and static method. 

Now final step we need to create the CDS view "ZVFIXXFORCAST03F" to be consumed by B4HANA system. This CDS view will read from above created table function. We can have additional logic or filters at CDS view level too.

@AbapCatalog.sqlViewName: 'ZVFIXXFORCAST03F'
@AbapCatalog.compiler.compareFilter: true
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED

@Analytics :{ dataCategory: #CUBE, dataExtraction.enabled: true }
@VDM.viewType : #CONSUMPTION
@OData.publish: true


define view ZCFIXXFORCAST03F as 
select from ZTFITRDOCCOUN01F
{
key transaction_id as TransactionID,
VTBFHAPO_BUKRS,
VTBFHAPO_RFHA,
VTBFHAPO_RANTYP,
VTBFHAPO_SSIGN,
VTBFHAPO_SBFREI,
VTBFHAPO_DZTERM,
VTBFHA_MERKM,
DESCRIPTION,
VTBFHAPO_CRUSER,
USR21_BNAME,
ADRP_NAME_TEXT,
USERNAME,
VTBFHAPO_SFHAZBA,
TZB0T_RANTYP,
TZB0T_SBEWART,
FLOWCATEGORY,
 @Semantics.currencyCode: true
VTBFHAPO_WZBETR,
 @Semantics.currencyCode: true
CURRENCY,
ENTEREDBY,
VTBFHA_KONTRH,
BUT000_PARTNER,
BUT000_NAME_ORG1,
PARTNERNAME,
VENDOR,
VENDORNAME,
CUSTOMER,
T001_BUKRS,
ADRC_NAME1,
CUSTOMERNAME,
FISCALYEAR,
DOCUMENTDATE,
POSTINGDATE,
DUEDATE,
ADJUSTEDDUEDATE as AdjustedDueDate,
TRANSACTIONDATE,
'Treasury' as Department,
TEAM,                                                    
@Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'VTBFHAPO_WZBETR'
case when VTBFHAPO_SSIGN = '-'
then VTBFHAPO_BZBETR * -1
else
VTBFHAPO_BZBETR end as VTBFHAPO_BZBETR,
@Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'CURRENCY'
case when VTBFHAPO_SSIGN = '-'
then VTBFHAPO_BZBETR * -1
else
VTBFHAPO_BZBETR end as ActualAmount 
} where 
( VTBFHAPO_RANTYP = '4' or
  VTBFHAPO_RANTYP = '5' or
  VTBFHAPO_RANTYP = '6' ) and
VTBFHAPO_SBFREI = 'X' and
VTBFHAPO_DZTERM >= $session. system_date

This way BW DataSource-->Referring "CDS View" -->Referring "Table Function" --> Referring "AMDP Static method"

The output is successful. 


Note - We have not only used CDS view as BW DataSource. Additionally we have consumed the same CDS for forecasting in SAP Analyics cloud.

entry.title: Re: How to set the "Material Origin" field to be checked...
entry.content: @Joey3 要在SAP S/4HANA公有云系统中配置物料主数据成本核算1视图的“物料来源”字段默认勾选，您必须使用扩展性 cockpit（事务代码：SPRO）定义一个自定义逻辑适配。具体方法是创建一个针对 MD_COCKPIT_AFTER_READ 这个BAdI的实现，并专门增强其 SET_DEFAULT_VALUES 方法。在此方法中，当在处理物料创建过程中的特定成本核算1视图时，您需要将值 'X'（代表已勾选）赋给 mkalb-origp 字段（该字段对应“物料来源”指示器）。此配置通过SAP云传输进行部署，可确保默认设置在全系统范围内应用，而无需修改标准SAP代码，遵循了云系统的应用内扩展指南。

entry.title: Re: No genera Arries las incapacidades
entry.content:
@Alex_Truper 

Con base en el análisis exhaustivo del problema descrito con los atrasos de Infonavit derivado de la implementación de la nota de SAP, la solución definitiva requiere un ajuste preciso dentro del esquema XPPR (Cálculo de Elementos de Pago y Deducción), específicamente en la lógica de procesamiento para los pagos por incapacidad.

El problema central es que el tipo de concepto /110 (base para el cálculo de la incapacidad) no se está formando correctamente, lo que hace que el sistema interprete el pago como una deducción corriente (/381) compensada por un pago (/561) en lugar de un concepto de atrasos. Para forzar el cálculo de atrasos (Opción 3 de la nota de SAP), debe modificar la Clase de Procesamiento 05 asignada a los tipos de concepto de incapacidad relevantes (e.g., /320 o sus derivados). Dentro de la operación en la regla X030 que actualmente genera el par /561//381, necesita insertar una función (probablemente NUMKI o una función similar que establezca el indicador de 'número de pagos') antes de la operación que crea el tipo de concepto de pago. Esta función debe asignar los atributos correctos para marcar el monto como atraso, asegurando que se direccione a través del proceso estándar de atrasos de Infonavit (tipos de concepto /8nn) y no por la ruta de liquidación inmediata. Concurrentemente, verifique en la Clase de Procesamiento 03 que el tipo de concepto de entrada esté correctamente marcado para su procesamiento como atraso en el esquema X020, y asegúrese de que el campo MODIF o el condicionamiento similar en la operación que crea /381 sea suprimido para prevenir la deducción errónea. Este cambio de configuración canalizará correctamente el monto through del framework de atrasos en lugar del bucle de deducción/compensación.
